properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 3:29AM CST until January 11 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City/Pleasant HIll MO
properties.description:
...Dangerous Travel Conditions Likely Friday Afternoon through
Saturday...

* WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow
accumulations of 5 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of one
tenth to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40
mph.

* WHERE...In Kansas, Atchison KS and Doniphan Counties. In
Missouri, Gentry, Harrison and Andrew Counties.

* WHEN...From noon today to 6 PM CST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will drop rapidly after sunset
Friday which could cause a flash freeze of any water on roads
and elevated surfaces in combination with the wintry mix already
falling.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY
